actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to student aid calculations from being based on assets in accounts that have been frozen by State action, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to exclude assets frozen in checking and savings accounts due to a State declaration of a bank emergency from consideration in determination of the expected family contribution in student aid calculations.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to student aid calculations from being based on assets in accounts that have been frozen by State action, and for other purposes.
